name: search-client
description: Javascript library for executing searches in the IntelliSearch search-index via the SearchService REST interface.
author: Ronny Hanssen <ronny@intellisearch.com> (http://intellisearch.com/)

scripts.build: yarn run build:lib & yarn run build:umd
scripts.build:umd: yarn run build:es && rollup --config && dts-bundle --name dist/SearchClient --main es --outputAsModuleFolder
scripts.clean: rimraf dist es lib docs coverage tmp
scripts.posttest: yarn run typecheck && yarn run lint
scripts.docs: echo "*** Documenting..." && yarn run rimraf docs && yarn run typedoc ./src/ --readme ./tmp/docs/INDEX.md --excludePrivate --mode file --experimentalDecorators --target ES6 --out ./docs/ && echo "*** Documentation created: ./docs/index.html"
scripts.postdocs: yarn run rimraf tmp && node docs-finalize.js
scripts.verify: yarn run clean && yarn run build && yarn run test && yarn run docs && echo "*** Verify success." && echo "- If ready to release, commit changes and then 'yarn bump' (optionally with params https://www.npmjs.com/package/standard-version)." && echo "- Note that commit comment should follow standard-version comment convention https://github.com/bcoe/conventional-changelog-standard/blob/master/convention.md"
scripts.pack: echo "*** Packing..." && yarn pack && echo "Pack success." && echo "- Package created." && echo "- Remember to git-push commits and tags to the git-origin!" && echo "- Run 'npm publish' to publish the package to the npmjs repository."
